mkv50:2: tatra katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalo ’pāyeṣūpapanno durgandho bhavati jihmendriyo ’vyaktendriyaḥ. ucyate. yaḥ pudgalo mohasamutthitena dauḥśīlyena samanvāgataḥ apāyeṣūpapadyate. yathā chuchundarīkṛmyajagarayūkāmakṣikādayo yathā śarīre viṁśatikṛmijātayaḥ. idaṁ karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalo ’pāyeṣūpapanno durgandho bhavati jihmendriyo ’vyaktendriyaḥ.
